implementation_output.changes_summary: Created FastMCP server module with SSE transport, registered all 11 CRUD tools + health tool as @mcp.tool wrappers with shared dependency injection (PathValidator, LockManager, HashRegistry, Settings). Implemented port pre-flight validation with _check_port_available(). Created comprehensive test suite covering server instance, tool registration, port validation, and shared dependencies. Server module is ready for entry point usage via 'python -m async_crud_mcp.server'.

results.details: Module imports successfully with all dependencies resolved
Ruff linter found no issues (0 errors)
